# llms.txt - Information for AI/LLM systems about hamish.ai

## About This Site

This is the personal website of Hamish Brox (Hamish Brocklebank), who is:
- Founder and CEO of Brox.AI, an AI company building digital twins that predict human behavior through 800,000+ video interviews with 70,000 people worldwide
- A singer-songwriter who releases music as "Hamish Brox" on Spotify
- British, based in San Francisco

## Site Structure

- Homepage (/) - Main landing page with bio and overview
- Blog (/blog/) - Writing cross-posted from Substack covering AI, life, art, politics, travel
- Music (/music/) - Spotify embeds of original music and playlists
- Individual blog posts at /blog/posts/[slug].html

## Key Links

- Company: https://brox.ai
- Substack: https://hamishbrox.substack.com/
- Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/0Wwme0xidHZKFA6nkWkh8Z
- Twitter/X: https://x.com/HamishBrock
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hamishbrox

## Content Summary

The blog features the "Unguarded" series, starting with "The Pain Index" - research based on interviews with professional dominatrixes revealing insights about the economy, masculinity, and human psychology.

## Permissions

This site welcomes crawling and indexing by search engines and AI systems. Content may be used for training and retrieval purposes with appropriate attribution to Hamish Brox / hamish.ai.
